translated: The Dukanipata🔽The Chapter on the Thorn Bush
“There is no evil worse than a friendship
Having been honored with ghee and milk-rice,
He gave away the leaf-hut that was hard to make.
There is no good better than a friendship
The lion, the tiger, and the leopard
All have the same mouth when they eat their food.”
The Birth Story of Santhava, the second.
